name: Sparky's Electrical Diagnostic Pack
description: Small diagnostic pack for timing analysis (10 should-hit, 3 should-miss)
should_hit: my powerpoint stopped working can you fix it
lights dimming when ac turns on
smoke alarm beeping every few minutes
how much for ceiling fan install
when can u come to logan
power went out in half the house
should_miss: toilet won't stop running need a plumber
solar panels not generating enough power
